name: Name that tune
summary:
Name That Tune was produced by Bally Sente in 1986. 
 
Bally Sente released 23 different machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1984. 
 
Other machines made by Bally Sente during the time period Name That Tune was produced include Spiker, Stompin', Moon Quake, Night Stocker, Shrike Avenger, Team Hat Trick, Toggle, Mini Golf, Mini Golf Deluxe, and Street Football.
